K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:364b-1: ratna tri mang+ga la g'a th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:364b-3: dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:364b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:364b-5: rgya mtsho lta bur rgal dka' 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:364b-6: bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis bsag dka' ma lus rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:364b-7: 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig gyur pa de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:364b-8: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:364b-9: rang don spangs shing gzhan don rtag tu lhur len cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:365a-0: @365a *// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lta ba brgyang bsrings te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:365a-1: dad dang brtson 'grus lhur len grogs mchog byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:365a-2: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:365a-3: skye 'gag med cing rtog pa'i 'ching byed mtha' dag spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:365a-4: ma rig mun pa 'joms byed stong nyid sgron ma'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:365a-5: dmigs pa sna tshogs spangs pa lam gyi bde sgrub chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:365a-6: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-071:365a-7: dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so ////
